Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (int i=JavaScriptURLConnection.JAVASCRIPT_PREFIX.length(); i < href.length(); i++) {
+ for (char ch : href.substring(JavaScriptURLConnection.JAVASCRIPT_PREFIX.length()).toCharArray()) {
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `href`, use an enhanced for loop. This makes the code cleaner and easier to understand.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract duplicate code into a method
Improvements.Description: The code to determine the target is duplicated. It can be extracted into a separate method to avoid code duplication.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- LOG.debug("do click action in window '" + w + "', using href '"+ href+ "'");
+ LOG.debug(String.format("do click action in window '%s', using href '%s'", w, href));
Improvements.Description: Using `String.format` is more readable and efficient than string concatenation.
